interaction.noDms: I prefer my privacy. Please talk to me in a guild instead.
interaction.noSettings: I could not find your guild record.
interaction.addedRole: You have been granted that title.
interaction.removedRole: You have been stripped of that title.
interaction.failedRole: I do not appear to be able to manage that title. Please let the server administrators know that I need permission to `Manage Roles`, and that the roles in these buttons must be lower than my **highest** role.

pending.title: A user is viewing the guild!
pending.desc: Because we have a magical barrier, they must complete verification before they can participate in our activities. When they have done so, I will officially welcome them.

join.title: A new adventurer has joined our guild!

leave.title: A member has abandoned our guild!
leave.name: Name

update.title: A member has updated their profile!

delete.title: Message Deleted
delete.desc: Here is my record of that message.
delete.nocont: No content. Embeds or attachments may be coming.

create.title: Thread Created
create.desc: The new thread {{- id}} was created!

delete.title: Thread Deleted
delete.desc: The thread {{name}} in the {{parentName}} channel was deleted.

archive.title: Thread Archived
archive.desc: The thread {{name}} in the {{parentName}} channel was archived.

unarchive.title: Thread Unarchived
unarchive.desc: The thread {{name}} in the {{parentName}} channel was unarchived.

move.title: Member switched channels!
move.desc: {{- userId}} has moved from {{- oldId}} to {{- newId}}.

leave.title: Member left voice channel!
leave.desc: {{- userId}} has left the {{- oldId}} channel.

join.title: Member joined voice channel!
join.desc: {{- userId}} has joined the {{- newId}} channel.
